: The winner of X Factor will be awarded$ 5 million record deal, the largest guaranteed prize in TV history. Simon Cowell also says he's glad that audiences are still interested in talent competitions. The good news is people are still excited about these shows- Idol, Dancing with the Stars, America's Got Talent- people, thank god, still like these shows and that gives me confidence for when we launch ours[ in the fall].
